ingredient.name: Omega-3 fatty acids
ingredient.description: Essential fatty acids with microbiome diversity and anti-inflammatory benefits

microbiome_effects.mechanism: Increases microbiome diversity and promotes butyrate-producing bacteria families
Enhances intestinal alkaline phosphatase secretion and reduces LPS-producing bacteria

metabolic_effects.mechanism: Improves gut microbiome diversity and reduces metabolic endotoxemia through anti-inflammatory effects

symptom_effects.population_notes: Increases gut microbiome diversity and reduces inflammatory markers with improved barrier function

citations.title: Omega-3 fatty acids correlate with gut microbiome diversity
